item.title: UGC Video about kids app - Upwork
item.description:
Make a video for our tiktok where you tell us about our app for kids with interactive cartoons and games.
The video should be up to 30 seconds long.
We provide a premium subscription for a month, you will get access to the entire app.
We will tell you what exactly you need to tell in the video (you will need to talk about the functionality, interactive cartoons, design, etc.)
Your face should be visible. You also need to show how your child uses our app.

item.title: UGC videos for product video ads (girls) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a UGC content creator to produce high-quality video ads (each of under 60 seconds) for 4 products in the skin care and wellness industry. Products like face serum, face mask, breast oil, Weight gainer, libido booster,  bum and back cream. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, editing, and delivering engaging video content that highlights the benefits and features of our products. This role requires a strong understanding of UGC trends and the ability to create content that resonates with our target audience.

    Key skills:
    - Video production
    - Video editing
    - Storyboarding
    - Content ideation
    - Creative direction
    - Knowledge of skin care and wellness industry

    Time frame: Under 60 Second

item.title: Camera & Lighting Equipment Specialist for Youtube and Twitch - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual who can help us find and setup the best camera and lighting equipment for our Youtube and Twitch channels. As our specialist, you will be responsible for researching and recommending the most suitable equipment based on our specific needs and budget. Additionally, you will assist us in setting up and optimizing the equipment for optimal video quality and lighting conditions. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of camera and lighting technology, as well as experience in the Youtube and Twitch streaming platforms. If you are passionate about creating high-quality videos and livestreams and have the expertise to help us achieve our goals, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $17.00-$44.00

item.title: YouTube Thumbnail Designer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative thumbnail designer to join our team. Your primary responsibility will be to create eye-catching YouTube thumbnails that will increase the click-through rate of our videos.

Responsibilities:

Design 10-20 thumbnails per week based on provided video content, photos, and themes.
Collaborate with our team to ensure the thumbnails align with our brand and attract viewers.
Revise thumbnails based on feedback until we are satisfied.
Ensure a maximum 12-hour turnaround time for each completed thumbnail.

Requirements:

Proven experience in creating high-quality YouTube thumbnails.
Strong understanding of design principles and how to attract viewers.
Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.
Availability to meet the required turnaround time consistently.

How to Apply:

Submit your bid pricing per 10 thumbnails.
Include a portfolio or samples of your previous thumbnail designs.
Briefly describe your experience and approach to creating effective thumbnails.


Budget: $25
Posted On: June 19, 2024 12:57 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Canva, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Imagery, Banner Ad Design, Photo Editing
Skills: Canva, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Imagery, Banner Ad Design, Photo Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube - B2B Growth & Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

We're an SEO agency, and we're looking to up our Youtube game. And by up it, I mean start it from scratch.

We have ideas of the types of content we want to create, along with the style we're looking for. However, I need somebody who is well-versed in growing fresh YouTube channels, and somebody who can help us edit our raw footage.

We'll also need advice on setups, from video to audio settings to make sure we're creating high-quality videos.

Here's an example of the style I'm looking for:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ye5dw-0OZXk&t=19s

I'm looking to commit to 1 10ish minute video a week, and also look to shorts. But I will hopefully be leaning on your expertise on what should be the goal for this.

I look forward to speaking with you soon.

Please send some examples of previous work.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 12:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, YouTube
Skills: YouTube Marketing, YouTube
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Graphic Designer for Social Media Posts - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented graphic designer to create social media post graphics on a monthly basis for 1-2 clients. The ideal candidate should have experience in designing eye-catching graphics that align with the clients' brand identities. In addition to static graphics, video editing skills would be a great advantage. The workload is estimated to be around 10-15 hours per month.

Responsibilities:
- Designing visually appealing social media post graphics
- Understand a client's brand identities and requirements
- Ensuring timely delivery of high-quality graphics

Required Skills:
- Proficiency in graphic design software (Canva is ok, Photoshop & Illustrator are Preferred)
- Strong creative and conceptual thinking
- Attention to detail and ability to follow brand guidelines
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
- Video editing skills (preferred)

If you have a strong portfolio showcasing your design skills and are passionate about creating engaging social media graphics, we would love to hear from you!

Please provide examples of your previous work when applying.

Hourly Range: $17.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 12:44 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Canva, Social Media Imagery, Instagram, Facebook, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
Skills: Canva, Social Media Imagery, Instagram, Facebook, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator

item.title: Video Editor For FootBall/Soccer - FREE SAMPLE REQUIRED - Upwork
item.description:
I need a video editor who's obsessed with soccer/football – someone who can make raw footage sizzle with highlights, killer transitions, and a vibe that gets fans pumped. Got some awesome soccer edits in your portfolio? That's step one.

Next, I need a FREE SAMPLE ( about 1 min - 2 min MAX )  edit using the voice-over I've ATTACHED – show me you can bring it together and make something that'll go viral. you can adjust speed tone, etc, anything, as long the video is amazing.  MAKE SURE and TRY TO

•  try to to actually show clips of videos of what the VoiceOver saying.
•  have multiples changes in sound effects and background music, so the viewer's brain remains  engaged


In the future, I will provide you with the voiceover/script,  your only job is to turn it into an amazing and engaging video.

I am looking forward to hearing from you.

Sample voiceover is here too:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ofBbAU2g2hHd9oJo7PcUEPDti35BsDc6/view?usp=drive_link

SCHEDULE:

Submit Your Sample by Saturday, June 21, 5 pm EST. We will review and have our decision by Monday, June 24, 2024

When you get selected, we will get on a call and discuss the Payment rate for an 8  - 12 min video

Here are some examples of videos we are  trying to model:

https://youtu.be/KRG8FvLNIVI?si=-tTVMSwSWnv5kl7L


https://youtu.be/LfuVapwVn28?si=L9EHF4VwcpL4PxAZ


https://youtu.be/ENEoGAvY6Jo?si=-TJNxI1p-Y7op-zW


https://youtu.be/JC1Ljb5InnM?si=Gh-UAruzmXemdIwI






Posted On: June 19, 2024 12:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Football, FIFA 22
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Football, FIFA 22
Country: Canada

item.title: YouTube Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Hey everyone, I need a video editor for my YouTube channel. 8/10 videos are basically me taking into my DSLR then it switching to me on Loom doing a tutorial so it will just need some fixing up so the sound is perfect, the picture is perfect, and some animations or whatever, just putting it all together and getting rid of the fluff basically.

I do it myself with Descript which takes roughly 2 hours max.

Video's are roughly 10-15 mins long and sometimes up to 20 minutes.

Nothing cray fancy to be honest I just don't have the 2 hours to edit and I need a quick turn around time, so someone who can get the files right after recording and have the video ready the next day.

My process now is I film edit and post and time it for my best post times.  If you can do that then great but it's unrealistic.

It will be 3x videos per week if you're cool and good then I'm happy to bump up pay to have you on a retainer.

Thanks.

P.S. Please don't paste replies of all sorts. Just apply normally. Thanks :)

oh and this is the channel:

https://youtu.be/3HpIYBJThxA



Budget: $30
Posted On: June 19, 2024 12:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Explainer Video, Elearning Video, Concept Video, Footage-Based Video, Corporate Video, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Editing
Skills: Explainer Video, Elearning Video, Concept Video, Footage-Based Video, Corporate Video, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Editing
Country: Norway
click to apply

item.ns0:encoded:
I am looking for an experienced Youtube video editor who is capable of creating captivating motivational videos using accurate footage, sound effects, appropriate music, transitions, and occasional effects.

Here is an example of the kind of style we’re looking for:
https://youtu.be/K9G3O03cVQI
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9fFDHeV04m8
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IRfW7MlMylI

Each video will average around 15-20 minutes, and we’re looking to produce 2 videos weekly depending how many you’re able to handle.

Looking to pay $110 / video (Around $7.5 / minute). If the quality you provide is really good, we’re willing to negotiate.

Budget: $880
Posted On: June 19, 2024 12:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing

item.title: Videographer Needed for Event in London on July 2nd for 3 HOURS ONLY - Upwork
item.description:
FOR 2,5-3 HOURS ONLY

I'm looking for a skilled videographer who can easily access the London Centrum/Old Truman Brewery area and capture 3 hours of the MadFest event in London on July 2nd, 2024.

The videographer will be responsible for recording high-quality footage of my interview and other conversations on the event ground, including some presentations and highlights.
WE ONLY NEED THE RAW FOOTAGE, NO EDITING IS REQUIRED

Skills required:
- Proficient in operating professional cameras and equipment
- Experience in capturing live events and interviews
- Comfortable shooting on the move while walking

This small, half-day project will last for a maximum of 3 hours. I have a budget of $300.

Thanks


Hourly Range: $40.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 12:28 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Camera, Video Production
Skills: Videography, Camera, Video Production
Country: United States
